GSD.description:
clk: qcom: ipq8074: dont disable gcc_sleep_clk_src

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.291 by commit 38cee0d2b65eed42a44052de1bfdc0177b6c3f05. For more details please see the references link.
